scripts.migrate: docker compose exec app npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
scripts.migrate:rollback: docker compose exec app npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo
scripts.seed: npm run seed:down && docker compose exec app npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.seed:down: docker compose exec app npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all
scripts.in:db: docker compose exec pg_db psql dev_db postgres
